sen.j: 藤原 義懐（ふじわら の よしちか、天徳 (日本)元年（957年） - 寛弘5年7月17日 (旧暦)（1008年8月20日））は平安時代中期の貴族。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Yoshichika (957 - AUGUST 20, 1008 (lunar calendar)) was a noble who lived in the Middle Heian period.

sen.e: He was born as the fifth son of FUJIWARA no Koretada, who was sessho (regent), of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.

sen.e: He worked actively as a guardian (chunagon (middle counselor) of the Emperor Kazan, who was his nephew.

sen.e: He met accidents that, when he was sixteen years old, his father, Koretada, died suddenly and, two years later, two elder brothers died from a disease on the same day, and he passed unfortunate days.

sen.j: 権中納言の官位自体は公卿の中では低く直ちに摂政関白に至る地位ではないものの、かつては藤原兼通（父・伊尹の弟）が天皇の伯父の資格で権中納言から一気に内覧内大臣に昇進してそのまま関白に就任した例もあり、義懐もまた次の大臣・関白の有力候補の一人になったのである。
sen.e: The position of gon-chunagon (acting middle counselor) itself was low status and it could not be expected to directly connected to the sessho or kanpaku (regent), but Yoshichika became one of promising candidate of the next daijin or kanpaku, because there was a precedent that FUJIWARA no Kanemichi (younger brother of Yoshichika's father, Koretada) was promoted from the gon-chunagon to the nairan naidaijin (minister of the center in the imperial palace) as an uncle of the emperor at a stretch.
